description:
The purpose of this lesson is to review and strengthen your knowledge of how you can apply primary factors to address and manage strong emotions at work. The lesson will give you anytime access to the fundamental skills and concepts of the course.

During the lesson you will have the opportunity to test your knowledge, review the fundamental skills and concepts, plan for application, and create and print your Personal Work Plan to help you apply the skills in the workplace.

The presentation slides and video lectures are approximately 25 minutes. You should take another 15-20 minutes to complete the Practical Application Questions and Personal Work Plan attachments.
title: Handling Strong Emotions in the Workplace
